remarks: Obsolete as of 14-Mar-2020.  Lemma for ~ ghgrpOLD .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Apr-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
ghgrpOLD.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : X -onto-> Y ) $.
ghgrpOLD.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X ) ) -> ( F ` ( x G y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) O ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
ghgrpOLD.3 $e |- H = ( O |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
ghgrplem2OLD $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( C e. X /\ D e. X ) ) -> ( F ` ( C G D ) ) = ( ( F ` C ) H ( F ` D ) ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d O x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ph x y $.
